# Function: useQueueState()

```ts
function useQueueState<TValue>(options): readonly [TValue[], {
  addItem: (item, position?) => boolean;
  clear: () => void;
  getAllItems: () => TValue[];
  getNextItem: (position?) => undefined | TValue;
  isEmpty: () => boolean;
  isFull: () => boolean;
  peek: (position?) => undefined | TValue;
  size: () => number;
 }]
```
